event_types.description: A list of telemetry event types to collect. Available event types: processes, windows_authentications, linux_authentications, macos_authentications, binary, network, dns, eventlog

alert_created.description: Reference timestamp used to retrieve telemetry data

timerange.description: Number of minutes before and after the reference timestamp used to define the data-collection time window

description: Get telemetry of an agent by its agentid
name: Get agent telemetry
